articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: OpenAI’s viral Studio Ghibli moment highlights AI copyright concerns - TechCrunch
articles.description: ChatGPT's new AI image generator is being used to create memes in the style of Studio Ghibli, reigniting copyright concerns.
articles.content: It’s only been a day since ChatGPT’s new AI image generator went live, and social media feeds are already flooded with AI-generated memes in the style of Studio Ghibli, the cult-favorite Japanese ani… [+3777 chars]
